name: Global Summit on Catalysis, Chemical Engineering and Technology
content: Apex Global Meetings is delighted to announce and cordially invite all the participants across the globe to attend Global Summit on Catalysis, Chemical Engineering and Technology (GSCCET2024), which will be taking place during August 19-21, 2024, in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia. The Theme of the Conference Highlights: Decadal Overview of Recent Trends and Innovations Changing in Catalysis and Chemical Engineering. Scientific Tracks designed for this conference will enable the attendees and participants to learn extremes. GSCCET2024 aims to gather the renowned scientists, young and brilliant researchers, academicians, healthcare professionals, and business delegates, and exceptional student communities across the globe under one roof and organize a healthy discussion so that the researchers and authors can present their work at the conference The objective of GSCCET2024 is to provide a comprehensive global forum for experts and participants from academia to exchange ideas and present results of on-going research in the most state-of-the-art areas in catalysis, chemical engineering, and technology. It will be hosting a forum of plenary, keynote, Invited lectures and oral/post presentations. We accept that this gathering will be exceptionally rewarding. Instructive and collaborative occasion for the attendees. We look forward to your valuable presence at GSCCET2024 August 19-21, 2024, Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia. Regards, StanLee | Event Manager GSCCET2024 Apex Global meetings
